# delegate

**Instance Property**

The search bar’s delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UISearchBarDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate should conform to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBarDelegate] protocol. Set this property to further modify the behavior. The default value is `nil`.

## Handling search bar interactions

- **UISearchBarDelegate**: A collection of optional methods that you implement to make a search bar control functional.
